Properties.ProtectedString:
--Rescripted by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
local UIS, CAS = game:GetService'UserInputService', game:GetService'ContextActionService'
Animations = {} Sounds = {}
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if not Humanoid then return end if Mode == "PlayAnimation" then for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v.Animation == Value then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() table.remove(Animations, i) end end local AnimationTrack = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Value) table.insert(Animations, {Animation = Value, AnimationTrack = AnimationTrack}) AnimationTrack:Play() elseif Mode == "PlaySound" then for i, v in pairs(Sounds) do if v == Value then table.remove(Sounds, i) end end table.insert(Sounds, Value) Value:Play() end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) pcall(function() ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) end) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("Click", true) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) Key = Key:lower() InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end)
if UIS.TouchEnabled then CAS:BindActionToInputTypes( 'ScytheOfSingularity_SpinnyPully', function(name, state, input) if state == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then InvokeServer('KeyPress', {Key = 'w', Down = true}) InvokeServer('KeyPress', {Key = 'w', Down = true}) InvokeServer("Click", true) end end, true, '' ) CAS:SetTitle('ScytheOfSingularity_SpinnyPully', 'Singularity') end end
function Unequipped() for i, v in pairs(Animations) do if v and v.AnimationTrack then v.AnimationTrack:Stop() end end for i, v in pairs(Sounds) do if v and v.Parent then v:Stop() end end Animations = {} Sounds = {}
if UIS.TouchEnabled then CAS:UnbindAction('ScytheOfSingularity_SpinnyPully') end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Rescripted by Luckymaxer --[[ Fixed by ArceusInator --]] local GLib = require(206209239)
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Damage = 22
Tool.Enabled = true
ScytheAOE = Vector3.new(22.5, 22.5, 22.5)
LastKeyDown = 0 DashTime = 0 LastSlash = 0
Equipped = false
Sounds = { EvilLaugh = Handle:WaitForChild("EvilLaugh"), Slash = Handle:WaitForChild("Slash") }
Animations = { Slash = Tool:WaitForChild("Slash"), Equip = Tool:WaitForChild("Equip") }
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if Mode == "Click" and Value then Activated() elseif Mode == "KeyPress" and Value.Key == "w" and Value.Down then local NewTick = tick() if (NewTick - LastKeyDown < 0.2) then DashTime = NewTick end LastKeyDown = NewTick end end)
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) pcall(function() ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Blow(Hit) local ownerPlayer, targetPlayer = GLib.GetPlayerFromPart(script), GLib.GetPlayerFromPart(Hit)
if not GLib.IsTeammate(ownerPlayer, targetPlayer) then if not Hit or not Hit.Parent or not Equipped or not Humanoid or not Humanoid.Parent or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end local humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not humanoid or humanoid == Humanoid then return end local RightArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if not RightArm then return end local RightGrip = RightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if not RightGrip and (RightGrip.Part0 ~= Handle and RightGrip.Part1 ~= Handle) then return end UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) end end
function SlashIt(myHumanoid, Torso) local OriginalDamage = Damage
Damage = 17
InvokeClient("PlaySound", Sounds.EvilLaugh)
Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0
local BVs = {}
local Parts = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList(Region3.new((Torso.Position - ScytheAOE), (Torso.Position + ScytheAOE)), {Character}, 100) for i, v in pairs(Parts) do if v and v.Parent then local character = v.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local torso = character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and torso then if not torso:FindFirstChild("ScytheBV") then local BV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BV.Name = "ScytheBV" BV.P = 100000 BV.maxForce = Vector3.new(BV.P, BV.P, BV.P) local Distance = (torso.Position - Torso.Position).magnitude BV.velocity = (Torso.Position - torso.Position).unit * 50 / Distance table.insert(BVs, BV) Debris:AddItem(BV, 5) BV.Parent = torso end end end end
local BG = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BG.P = 100000 BG.maxTorque = Vector3.new(BG.P, BG.P, BG.P) BG.Name = "BG"
local TorsoCFrame = { Torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, (1 * (math.pi / 3)), 0), Torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, (2 * (math.pi / 3)), 0), Torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0), Torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, (4 * (math.pi / 3)), 0), Torso.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, (5 * (math.pi / 3)), 0), Torso.CFrame }
BG.Parent = Torso
for i = 1, 84 do local c = ((i % 6) + 1) if BG then BG.cframe = TorsoCFrame[c] end wait(0.025) end
for i, v in pairs(BVs) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end
if BG and BG.Parent then BG:Destroy() end
if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end
wait(5.0)
Damage = OriginalDamage
end
function SetTransparency(Parent, Transparency) local function SetTransparent(Parent, Transparency) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do pcall(function() if v.Name ~= "HumanoidRootPart" then v.Transparency = Transparency end end) SetTransparency(v) end end SetTransparent(Parent, Transparency) end
function Activated() if not Tool.Enabled or not Humanoid.Parent or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso.Parent then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
if (tick() - DashTime) < 0.2 then SlashIt(Humanoid, Torso) else InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animations.Slash) InvokeClient("PlaySound", Sounds.Slash) end
wait(1)
Tool.Enabled = true
end
function Equipped() Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end SetTransparency(Character, 0.5) InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animations.Equip) end
function Unequipped()
Equipped = false
if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end
if Torso and Torso.Parent then for i, v in pairs(Torso:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BodyGyro") and v.Name == "BG" then v:Destroy() end end end
SetTransparency(Character, 0)
end
Handle.Touched:connect(Blow)
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
